channel.title: Acryliex 474 | Amazing Skilling | Economy | Amazing Pking | Working Quests
channel.description:
[center]PUT BANNER HERE[/center]
[center] [b]Welcome to Acryliex[/b]
[b]Server Features[/b] -Very Minimal of bugs in the server. -Correct Item Configurations. -Reasonable Item Prices. -Working Custom Interfaces. -Enhanced Server Stability. (Blitz Engine) -A Stable Economy. -Amazing Pking + Switching. -All working 474 Emotes/GFx. -Rare Items are colored for better looting. -Working Barrows Effects (Lower HP with DH). -Working Lunar Magicks. -Working Ancient Magicks. -Working Modern Magicks. -Working prayers + Piety/Chivalry. -3 Working Quests. -Simple PVM/PVE. -Working Quickchat.
[b]Server Skilling[/b] 95% Working Herblore 85% Working Woodcutting 100% Working Fishing 100% Working Gem Cutting 50% Working Fletching 10% Working Firemaking
Listen, My staff may be young (13+), but that doesn't matter. They're mature and I respect them. If you have a problem with them, don't flame on my post.
[b]Staff Members[/b] Owner - Kai ([url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=569538]joelandjacob[/url]) Administrator - None Administrator - None Moderator - Dclawed Moderator - None Moderator - None
Staff Application: (Moderator) [code] MoparScape Username: In-Game Username: Skype Username: Experience: Specialties: Age: Why you think you deserve to be a Staff Member: [/code]
[b]Media[/b] 100% Working Rules Interface [img]http://gyazo.com/222e311ed0e129805d2cbb47489680f5.png?1345955467[/img]
100% Working Crafting [img]http://gyazo.com/69c80fa4edb596bfb99d5f1268e17d9e.png?1345946043[/img]
Working Custom Pking Interface [img]http://gyazo.com/16a3887f216b6874de8ff53dc5184696.png?1345946213[/img]
100% Working Skillcapes [img]http://gyazo.com/b8d7953f966ea3c07b62ab89c59efedb.png?1345948217[/img]
Rare Items are Highlighted [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/34rc32d.png[/img]
100% Working Ring of Stone [img]http://gyazo.com/a0aa0a75e38b1269f119515e7615e7bd.png?1345954775[/img]
50% Working Fletching + Interfaces + Emotes [img]http://gyazo.com/d336180dcf487eaf4f7e64cbc07a6ff0.png?1346039614[/img]
100% Working Skillcapes + Quest Point Cape [img]http://gyazo.com/3b23da765bc4197892e6b742305e7f81.png?1346040135[/img]
Come join us for an amazing time, we gurantee you will have the most fun in a lifetime. [/center]

Made a banner, look below, also website is being done, this will be a great server, and we would love all of you to join, Kai is currently working on skilling etc, and other stuff. Hope to see you at Acryliex

Thanks.

Don`t post or you will be most likely be reported by the person who created this thread, I would advise you not to post unless you are serious about this job.

item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“joelandjacob, post:9, topic:455410”][quote author=dclawed link=topic=558311.msg4084319#msg4084319 date=1345663674]
I would love to be an admin or mod, I am dedicated, trustworthy, active, mature and friendly, I have played a variety of rsps, including soulsplit, near reality, torva pkz, legacy 614 and more! I also played rs, still play but not as much, I am 14 soon, I am good at english and I would love a chance to be part of this succesfull server. Please pm me if you would like to be staff, I will advertise and also will make guides/videos for server.

Thanks alot!
~Dclawed~
[/quote]

/Accepted as Moderator[/quote]

Rofl, hire a 13 year old who can’t spell ‘successful’.

Read full topic

@joelandjacob wrote:

[center]PUT BANNER HERE[/center]

[center]
Welcome to Acryliex

Server Features
-Very Minimal of bugs in the server.
-Correct Item Configurations.
-Reasonable Item Prices.
-Working Custom Interfaces.
-Enhanced Server Stability. (Blitz Engine)
-A Stable Economy.
-Amazing Pking + Switching.
-All working 474 Emotes/GFx.
-Rare Items are colored for better looting.
-Working Barrows Effects (Lower HP with DH).
-Working Lunar Magicks.
-Working Ancient Magicks.
-Working Modern Magicks.
-Working prayers + Piety/Chivalry.
-3 Working Quests.
-Simple PVM/PVE.
-Working Quickchat.

Server Skilling
95% Working Herblore
85% Working Woodcutting
100% Working Fishing
100% Working Gem Cutting
50% Working Fletching
10% Working Firemaking

Listen, My staff may be young (13+), but that doesn’t matter. They’re mature and I respect them.
If you have a problem with them, don’t flame on my post.

Staff Members
Owner - Kai (joelandjacob)
Administrator - None
